            Subject: - INJURY OF CISF PERSONNEL  : REG   
 
Recently a case has come to the notice of this Directorate wherein a Constable fell 
down from the platform of the watch tower i.e. from a height of 15 feet, as the iron platform 
of the Watch Tower had corroded.  The Constable was lucky to survive the 15 feet fall with 
minor injuries for it could have been fatal.  
 
 
 
In view of the above, the unit commanders are advised to ensure that all watch towers 
are periodically (at least once a month) checked to ensure their worthiness so that such 
incident are prevented.
